name: Hentai Maid Momoka
description:
Momoka will take care of you and I promise, you won't be disappointed.
She really is a premium one you know ;)



if you're looking to relax and learn a bit of anatomy then you've come to the right place.
Maid Momoka is here to help you
She's a bit shy and a bit (okay, a lot) naughty, but that's what makes her so fun to play with.

Btw, I haven't seen Momoka eat anything yet.. she never seems to drink water either. I haven't even seen her use the bathroom!
She's like some sort of non-human being.
maybe one day we'll find out more about her.

Anyway, Momoka is a great and kind-hearted maid. I'm lucky to have her around, even though I don't understand how she manages to look so fabulous all the time.
But enough about that, you'll have to see it for yourself!


Features


  • Revealing Clothes
After you completed the puzzle you can click on the puzzle and her clothes will be removed

  • Gallery
The game has a zoom feature. You can double-click or scroll to zoom in on the pictures in the gallery. (I wanted to mention this in case you want to do some scientific research..)

  • Relaxing Music Player
There's a music player in the game, so you can dance while you play.. or you can just turn it off if you don't like it. Everyone has the right to play the game in silence and peace, right?

Let me know what you think!
Happy gaming ;)
